item.title: Freiberg - Research Seminar
item.description: In this talk Andr√© Dietrich gives a brief overview on the research history around LiaScript and RemoteLabs.

item.title: Serverless Online Education
item.description: The presentation at the Open Educa Berlin (OEB) Conference on November 24th 2023 focused on “Serverless Online Education” and emphasized the potential of decentralized, browser-based technologies in educational settings.
